content.key_points:
**Open-ended questions:**

- are those which can be answered in a variety of ways

**Closed-ended questions:**

- limit the client's answer to either "yes" or "no"

questions.question_text: Which of the following questions is appropriate to ask a client with diabetes mellitus?
options: 4. "Do you feel thirsty all the time?"
questions.rationale: **RATIONALE**\n\nThe question in option C is open-ended and is therefore more therapeutic than the closed-ended questions in the other options.

extraction_metadata.notes: Single therapeutic communication question from left side of PDF page 35
extraction_metadata.reference: Keltner, Norman L. et.al. Psychiatric Nursing Philadelphia, Mosby
